name: pseandersson
body:
### Welcome
My name is Patrik Andersson, living in Sweden and I've got a great passion for 3D-modelling, programming and mathematics. I've got a  BSc in Civil Engineering and MSc in Engineering Mathematics and Computational Science. Currently I working at Volvo Cars with development of test and verification methods.

On this page I will present some open source project I'm working on, on my spare time. Most things is for an animated short movie I'm working on.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
